explains: n. 胡桃，核桃；胡桃树，核桃树；胡桃木，核桃木；胡桃色
wordGroup: black walnut 黑胡桃；黑胡桃木
walnut oil 核桃油；胡桃油

sentences.en: She watches him plane the surface of a walnut board.
sentences.cn: 她看着他刨一块胡桃木板。

sentences.en: King among the nuts is the walnut.
They were perfectly round white things a trifle smaller than an English walnut.
sentences.cn: 它们是完美的圆形白色物体，比英国胡桃小一点。
